channel.title: Stance, wielding, and holding. help please
channel.description: OK, see i got a ss, dfs, and dragon plate body. and neither of them are set right nor hold right. My server is Deltascape based btw. And see, dfs just kinda follows you along your side. ss does too. So what file in client area would i look in. I can about handle it from there.

item.title: Stance, wielding, and holding. help please
item.dc:creator: @xxckwxx xxckwxx
item.description:
@xxckwxx wrote:

I see, ty. Ah, i have “twohanded.DAT” and, in item.java it holds the directory for it. what about this?

Read full topic
item.source: Stance, wielding, and holding. help please

item.title: Stance, wielding, and holding. help please
item.dc:creator: @Sp3ke Sp3ke
item.description:
@Sp3ke wrote:

It should be something like twohanded

Mines set so if it’s not declared it automatically sets it to weapons.

Read full topic
